channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I am increasingly resentful’: My husband of 10 years has $1 million and cars worth $200K Why won’t he give me money?
item.description: “I maintain the household, walk the dogs and cook regular meals for us both.”

item.title: Why ‘buy the dip’ is not that great a strategy, quant firm discovers
item.description: Researchers at AQR tested out buy-the-dip as an investing strategy and were not impressed.

item.title: ‘I don’t have money to pay for a death certificate’: My sister refuses to probate my father’s estate. What can I do?
item.description: “I recently received paperwork from a company that my father had invested in.”

item.title: Even Paramount now thinks Netflix is winning the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount Skydance had been considered the front-runner in the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery, but signaled on Thursday that it felt it was lo...

item.title: A Wall Street legend has passed, but his ’10 surprise’ framework lives on. Manufacturing may be primed for a boom, this firm says.
item.description: U.K. research firm Variant Perception expects manufacturing outside of AI to pick up.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
